cases.title: SENDS rate underpayment
cases.summary: SENDS commission rate for Cybervox was reduced from 3.00% to 1.75% effective March 11 per Addendum #2 to contract 1607-24. The expected commission calculation still used the original 3.00% rate, resulting in an apparent underpayment of 32,133.28 EUR.

cases.title: Missing transactions in Impaya settlement
cases.summary: 3 transactions totaling 759.80 EUR processed through Impaya for Cybervox in March 2025 are present in our registry but missing from the Impaya reconciliation settlement.
